channel.title: NPC autospawn Error
channel.description:
I put more npc's into the autospawn so it looks like this ---------------------------------------------------------- //------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-HP-Descrption spawn = 166 2516 3050 2 0 0 0 0 1 Banker spawn = 795 2514 3024 2 0 0 0 0 1 Ice Queen spawn = 3200 2530 3019 2 2744 9150 2693 9213 1 Chaos Elemental spawn = 2745 2521 3012 2 2744 9150 2693 9213 1 Hairy Kitty spawn = 1158 2500 3012 2 2744 9150 2693 9213 1 Kalphite Queen spawn = 1592 2527 3044 2 2744 9150 2693 9213 1 Bronze Dragon spawn = 3642 2519 3043 2 2744 9150 2693 9213 1 King Black Dragon spawn = 2359 2510 3037 2 2744 9150 2693 9213 1 Elf Warrior spawn = 2883 2507 3024 2 2744 9150 2693 9213 1 Dagannoth Prime --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
So i compile it and it was good but then when i ran the server i got this.. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Loading npcs... drops... spawn list...Exception in thread "main" java.lang.Array IndexOutOfBoundsException: 3642 at NPCHandler.newNPC(NPCHandler.java:62) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1335) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:60) -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Can anyone please help me on what i did wrong? :( im very new to this

item.title: NPC autospawn Error
item.dc:creator: @woofdawg23 woofdawg23
item.description:
@woofdawg23 wrote:

that means that one of the npc’s coords are out of bounds meaning in a spot that does not exist. For example if you do’nt understand what i mean here is an example of out an out of bounce npc

spawn = 3200 9999 9999 2 2744 9150 2693 9213 1 Chaos Elemental

Read full topic

item.description:
@iownhard56 wrote:

im new to so first try change there names to just pc monster

if that dosnt work try change the 2 to a 0 i think… idk

Read full topic

item.title: NPC autospawn Error
item.dc:creator: @lunatik lunatik
item.description:
@lunatik wrote:

I put more npc’s into the autospawn so it looks like this

//------NpcID—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-HP-Descrption
spawn = 166 2516 3050 2 0 0 0 0 1 Banker
spawn = 795 2514 3024 2 0 0 0 0 1 Ice Queen
spawn = 3200 2530 3019 2 2744 9150 2693 9213 1 Chaos Elemental
spawn = 2745 2521 3012 2 2744 9150 2693 9213 1 Hairy Kitty
spawn = 1158 2500 3012 2 2744 9150 2693 9213 1 Kalphite Queen
spawn = 1592 2527 3044 2 2744 9150 2693 9213 1 Bronze Dragon
spawn = 3642 2519 3043 2 2744 9150 2693 9213 1 King Black Dragon
spawn = 2359 2510 3037 2 2744 9150 2693 9213 1 Elf Warrior
spawn = 2883 2507 3024 2 2744 9150 2693 9213 1 Dagannoth Prime

So i compile it and it was good but then when i ran the server i got this…

Loading npcs… drops… spawn list…Exception in thread “main” java.lang.Array
IndexOutOfBoundsException: 3642
at NPCHandler.newNPC(NPCHandler.java:62)
at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1335)
at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:30)
at server.main(server.java:60)

Can anyone please help me on what i did wrong? im very new to this

Read full topic
